summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the sale of land for housing development in the I-90 Redevelopment Project area; authorizing the Director of Housing and Human Services to permit Homesight to exchange Parcel 12 for another parcel for the purpose of housing development; authorizing assignment and modification of the contract for sale and a new form of deed for Parcel 12; amending Ordinance 116915; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
